titleStmt.title: Milites caus√¶, the souldiers of right, or, Vox reformatorum, the remonstrance of the reformado's declaring, avouching, and maintaining 1. Their true obedience to the Lord Fairfax as commander in chief, 2. Their unanimous adhering to his undertakings, 3. Their fidelity to their country, 4. Their merits and sufferings, 5. Their perseverance in their first principles : distributed into 14 particulars and published for their own vindication and common satisfaction : December 21, 1648.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Appended: A true and reall list of the faithfull commanders (p. 17-20)
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
